name: HeliRace
description:
What is HeliRace?

HeliRace is a helicopter racing game with weapons and boost items inspired by some famous kart racing game. 

There are a total of 16 tracks available in 4 different environments. There is also a battle area in every environment.

Two physics modes are available : Arcade and Simulation. Both offering their respective challenges.

Tutorials are included to help you master the 4-axis flight controls of a helicopter.

You can race in a single race or a championship (both available for 1 or 2 players in splitscreen), against the clock in time trial mode or against a friend in versus mode. You can also battle against a friend with the only objective of destroying his/her helicopter!

Gamepads supported (and recommended)

Inputs for the game are customizable.  A gamepad with 2 analog joysticks is highly recommended although it is possible to play the game with a keyboard.

Multiplayer

Only 2 player splitscreen is supported at the moment. You can also race against an AI at 3 different difficulty levels.

Pricing

Pricing is "Pay what you want". If you want to play for free, you can! However a contribution would be greatly appreciated if you like the game.

Installation

Unzip to a convenient location and execute HeliRace.exe.
